product_name: Park Tool Premium Rescue MTB-2 Bike Multitool
long_description: Updated with more tools, an upgraded chain tool and a sleeker, smaller size, the Park Premium Rescue MTB-2 Bike Multitool tackles nearly any road or trailside emergency repair. Composite protective shell doubles as 2 super-strong tire levers. The Park Premium Rescue MTB-2 Bike Multitool includes: 10-speed compatible chain tool; disc brake piston press; rotor truing tool; emergency pedal wrench. Presta valve core/extension tool (4mm); hex wrenches (1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, and 8mm); T10, T25 and T30 Torx compatible drivers; box end wrenches (8, 9, 10mm). 3 spoke wrenches (0.127 in., 0.130 in. and 0.136 in./SW-0, 1 and 2 sizes); flat blade and Phillips head screwdriver; bottle opener; knife.
short_description: Updated with more tools, an upgraded chain tool and a sleeker, smaller size, the Park Premium Rescue MTB-2 Bike Multitool tackles nearly any road or trailside emergency repair.
